title: Bug 102623: Image can't be refreshed after importing again.
description: When importing a new image into the layout, the image is not being refreshed and the original image is still being displayed.
OB: Import the new image 'image1.jpg' into the layout. The new image should be displayed.
EB: After importing the new image 'image1.jpg' into the layout, the expected result is that the new image is displayed.
SR: Investigate why the imported image is not being refreshed and the original image persists. Modify the code to ensure that the new image is correctly displayed after importing.
